text: I hope you'll check out my new book @TruthWorthTelling. It tells the stories of people who discovered the meaning of their lives during the historic events of our time. These days we could all use a little inspiration. I hope you find it in Truth Worth Telling.
author: ScottPelley

text: .@CBSDavidMartin is telling me the Pentagon is working on a bigger strike against Syria than we knew. He's on the @CBSEveningNews tonight.

text: Just spoke to @elizapalmer in Damascus, Syria. She's on the frontlines, incredibly courageous!
author: ScottPelley

text: Just got off the phone with @clarissaward. She made a dangerous run into Syria today to see the rebels. She's on @CBSEveningNews tonight.
author: ScottPelley

text: Just talked to @elizapalmer in Damascus. She says there's a veneer of normality there as residents brace for U.S. strike.
author: ScottPelley

text: .@elizapalmer is the only US network reporter in Damascus as city braces for American air strike. We'll have her on the broadcast tonight.

text: .@CBSDavidMartin has learned about the evidence the US is using to support an attack on Syria; we'll have it tonight on #EveNews.
